channel.title: Ric's webcleint tut, need help
channel.description:
2.3 - Step 3 - Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java(Sprites) Now for the sprite part. Which most people don't do right. Open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and replace all:
[code]./Sprites/[/code] with this
Quote [code]C:/.yourclientname_file_store_32/Sprites/[/code]
There i no "./Sprites/" in my Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java. can someone help me please.

item.title: Ric's webcleint tut, need help
item.dc:creator: @R4nger_0wnz R4nger 0wnz
item.description:
@R4nger_0wnz wrote:

2.3 - Step 3 - Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java(Sprites)
Now for the sprite part. Which most people don’t do right.
Open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and replace all:

./Sprites/

with this

Quote

C:/.yourclientname_file_store_32/Sprites/

There i no “./Sprites/” in my Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java. can someone help me please.

Read full topic
